meanings.definition: A highly impressive or remarkable event or performance.
meanings.sent1: The circus had many superspectaculars that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display was a superspectacular that lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The school talent show had a superspectacular performance by the young magician.
meanings.sent4: Her birthday party was a superspectacular, with decorations and games galore.
meanings.sent5: The grand finale of the concert was a superspectacular that left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Something that is extremely impressive or outstanding in appearance or quality.
meanings.sent1: The diamond necklace was a superspectacular piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was a superspectacular sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The new sports car was a superspectacular addition to his collection.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak was a superspectacular view from the valley below.
meanings.sent5: The garden in full bloom was a superspectacular display of colors and scents.
